help.description: Display all commands and their descriptions.

insert.description: Add a track to the beginning of the queue.
insert.usageReply: Usage: {prefix}insert <Video or audio URL | Video name>

options.playlist: True if your search is for a playlist.

invite.result: I sent the invitation in your private messages. üëç

jumpto.description: Jump to the selected queue number.
jumpto.errorNotValid: This is not a valid position.

options.position: The position in the queue where you want to go.

loop.result: The loop mode is now set to: `{loop}`.

lyrics.description: Get the lyrics of the currently playing track.

move.result: The track **"{title}"** has been moved to position {index} in the queue. ‚úÖ

options.position: The position in the queue you want to move.
options.new_position: The new position to which you want to move it.

play.description: Listen to music from YouTube and other sources.
play.usageReply: Usage: {prefix}play <Video or audio URL | Video name>

options.playlist: True if your search is for a playlist.

previous.description: Go back to the previous track in the playback queue.
previous.result: Successfully returned to the previous track. ‚èÆ
previous.error: Unable to go back, there is no previous music.

queue.description: Display the queue and the currently playing track.

remove.description: Remove a track from the queue.
remove.result: **{title}** has been removed from the queue.
remove.results: **{titles}** have been removed from the queue.

options.query: The position in the queue you want to remove | Tip: Remove multiple with ',' symbol.

resume.description: Resume playback of the paused music.

search.description: Search and select videos to listen to.

options.playlist: True if your search is for a playlist.

seek.description: Allows you to jump to a specific moment in the current music.
seek.usageReply: Usage: {prefix}seek <Number of seconds or time formatted as (02:30)>
seek.errorSource: This command doesn't work with SoundCloud links or audio files.
seek.errorNotValid: The number of seconds must be between 0 and the duration of the track ({duration}).
seek.result: The music has been resumed at : `{time}`

options.time: The number of seconds to skip or the time code you want to go to in the 'hh:mm:ss' format.

volume.description: Change the currently playing music's volume.
volume.errorNotNumber: Please use a number to set the volume.
volume.intervalError: Please use a number between 0 and 100.

options.level: The player's volume within the range [0;100].

nowplayingMsg.errorWritePermission: You must have write permission in this channel to interact.

player.trackAdded: ‚úÖ [**{title}**]({url}) has been added to the queue.
player.playlistAdded: ‚úÖ Playlist [**{title}**]({url}) containing {length} tracks with a total duration of {duration} has been added to the queue.
player.error: An error occurred while trying to play the audio.

errors.notChannel: You must first join a voice channel!
errors.command: An error occurred while executing this command.
errors.notInSameChannel: You need to be in the same channel as me.
errors.missingPermissionConnect: Unable to connect to the voice channel, missing permissions.
errors.missingPermissionSpeak: I can't speak in this voice channel, make sure I have the permissions.
errors.ageRestricted: This video is subject to an age restriction and therefore cannot be played.
errors.invalidURL: The provided link is either misspelled, unavailable, or not supported.
errors.serviceUnavailable: Failed to connect to the source server. Please try again later.
